localizableAttributes.longDescription:
Your Sims are searching for meaning and they just don't know it yet. Give your Sims a place to practice their beliefs with the Houses of Worship set. Your city has an admirable diversity that is reflected in their beliefs. Provide a gathering place for your more pious Sims to congregate in fellowship or in quiet solitude. Sims throughout your city will visit the assorted houses of worship and leave a bit more happy and at peace.

GAME FEATURES:
表tHouse of Worship: Church: With bell towers and stained glass windows, this scenic Church brings classic European charm to your city. Sims seeking answers will flock here and leave with a beatific glow. Similar to a park, Sims can visit the church even if they have no money and emerge with happiness. This cultural building is perfect for customizing the look of your city and helping your residents find peace. Just be careful, don't bulldoze a church
表tHouse of Worship: Temple: This ornate Temple brings the beliefs of the Far East to your city. Devout Sims will come here to meditate on the meaning of life and return home feeling fulfilled. Similar to a park, Sims can visit the temple even if they have no money and emerge with happiness. This cultural building is perfect for customizing the look of your city and helping your residents reach an inner harmony. Don't bulldoze the temple if you want to stay in good graces
表tHouse of Worship: Mosque: The minarets on the impressive Mosque add character to any neighborhood. Sims looking for a higher power will seek answers at the Mosque and leave feeling at peace. Similar to a park, Sims can visit the mosque even if they have no money and emerge with happiness. This cultural building is perfect for customizing the look of your city and helping your residents find guidance in life. Don't tempt fate by bulldozing a mosque
表tHouse of Worship: Modern Temple: Free from the trappings of a traditional church, the Modern Temple has realigned its auras toward the future. Sims seeking guidance will visit this place and leave with an inner peace. Similar to a park, Sims can visit the modern temple even if they have no money and emerge with happiness. This cultural building is perfect for customizing the look of your city and helping your residents find answers. It would be unwise to bulldoze a modern temple
localizableAttributes.shortDescription: Give your Sims a place to practice their beliefs with the Houses of Worship set.
